transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Ji sir, good afternoon. Shweta baat karti hu.
Customer: Ha boliye boliye.
Executive: Sir mere paas ek feedback aaya tha. Abhi aapne video meeting ka request dala hai kya?
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi. Oh, toh mera banda dala hai shayad.
Executive: Toh unka number bata dijiye. Main office mein jaake woh dusra number hai na 8900?
Customer: Maine us pe call kiya connect nahi hua sir.
Executive: Accha main abhi jaake aapko call karne ke liye bol raha hu. Theek hai?
Executive: Ha bol dijiye. Toh ye matlab customer care pe aapne isko dala hai feedback.
Customer: Shayad ho gaya ho gaya aisa ho sakta hai.
Executive: Accha chaliye aap unse connect karwa dijiye. Uske baad main isko close kar dungi.
Customer: Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Executive received feedback about video meeting request.

- Customer says call not connecting on given number.



Resolution:

- Executive will ask the person to call customer.

- Executive will close the feedback after connection.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will ask the person to call customer.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- feedback, video meeting, customer care
